name: Pictioner
description: Pictioner is an engaging game where users are challenged to guess what GPT sketches on the canvas within three attempts. Success leads to subsequent rounds, whereas a wrong guess results in elimination. Prepare for unending fun! Pictioner was spotlighted on Product Hunt in May 2023.

name: Hello Cody: A Voice Assistant for VS Code
description: Emerging as the winner in the developer productivity challenge of Microsoft's internal 'Global Hackathon', this project has evolved to become part of GitHub Copilot X. My contributions included project initiation, proposal to Microsoft and GitHub executives for approval, and cooperation with the GitHub Next team to bring the project to fruition. The project was launched in the GitHub Universe conference and has also resulted in multiple patent filings.

name: Wordle Helper
description: A handy Edge Extension designed to accompany Wordle. Input the letters you already know and use the provided suggestions to brainstorm on the possible word of the day.

name: Course: Alexa 101, Designing Voice Apps for Alexa
description: A comprehensive, interactive course on how to create voice apps for Alexa, featuring practical examples and hands-on projects. Developed in collaboration with Educative.

name: Sensor Streamer
description: An Android app enabling users to stream phone sensor data, images, and audio in real-time to a server hosted on their Raspberry Pi or computer. The project has served thousands of users and has a high rating and positive reviews on Google Play.

name: Phone Pi Sensor Streamer
description: An Android app that lets users stream phone sensor data in real-time to a specified server running on their Raspberry Pi or computer.

name: Resolution Tracker
description: An Amazon Alexa Skill designed to monitor your New Year resolutions and conveniently update your progress via Twitter. Resolution Tracker was honored as the 'Skill of the Month' in December 2017 by Amazon.

name: Trivia Quest
description: An Amazon Alexa game designed to test your knowledge. Strive to reach the top of the global leaderboard! Trivia Quest has been enjoyed by thousands of Alexa users worldwide and has a 3.2/5 rating on Amazon.

name: Multi-step Wizard Fluent
description: A fully adaptable React component designed for creating personalized multi-step forms.

name: Voice Clues
description: A cross-platform voice game accessible on Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa, developed using Jovo. The project was awarded first place in the Alexa Skills Wizard challenge (for university students) by Amazon.

name: SMS Genie
description: An educational SMS bot developed to assist learning in remote areas with limited internet connectivity.
